content.rendered: Aparna Nelson works as a Student finance Officer at Regent College London. Originally from Canada, she now calls London home after moving here about 2 years ago. Her key responsibilities in this role include providing advice and guidance to students about tuition fees and other loans, and liaising with University partners for all student funding matters. Her empathy and friendliness make it easier for students to communicate with her and confide in her about their financial concerns. She is a qualified mechanical engineer, however, has now switched gears looking to excel in the finance sector. While not at work, you can find her in the crime thriller section of a bookstore or scrolling through the same, online.
